overview: Two young lovers, Mary and Tim, deal with pressure, parents and change in this heartfelt drama.
tagline: The Circle is LOVE. The Circle is CONFLICT. The Circle is LAUGHS. The Circle is TEARS. The Circle is LIFE. The Circle is DEATH. The Circle is FREEDOM. The Circle is CONFINING. The Circle is THE START. The Circle is THE END. The Circle is NOW!
title: The Circle
